content.body: On further reflection (updated above PR, it‚Äôs possible to implement Loader in user code, with all of the ‚Äústatic import‚Äù part of Import Reflection, ModuleInstance, and a Global constructor for the hardened JavaScript case. The user-code Loader wouldn‚Äôt be able to do import reflection on your behalf, so you‚Äôd have to learn harder on that.
